meanings.definition: Having a decorative ruffle or gathered border.
meanings.sent1: The frilled dress looked elegant and fancy.
meanings.sent2: She wore a frilled blouse to the party.
meanings.sent3: The frilled curtains danced in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The frilled edges of the cake added a touch of sophistication.
meanings.sent5: The frilled pillowcases made the bed feel luxurious.

meanings.definition: To make a garment or material with a frill.
meanings.sent1: She frilled the hem of her skirt for a unique look.
meanings.sent2: The designer frilled the sleeves of the dress for a playful touch.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally frilled the tablecloth while trying to iron it.
meanings.sent4: The chef skillfully frilled the pastry edges for an exquisite presentation.
meanings.sent5: The tailor frilled the collar of the shirt to match the latest trend.

meanings.definition: A decorative ruffle or gathered border on a garment or material.
meanings.sent1: The dress had a beautiful frilled neckline.
meanings.sent2: She added a frilled trim to the curtains for a charming look.
meanings.sent3: The frilled edge of the tablecloth made it stand out at the event.
meanings.sent4: The frilled hem of the skirt swayed gracefully as she walked.
meanings.sent5: The frilled border on the pillowcases gave them a touch of elegance.
